name: Void Runner (technsmile)
description:
Escape a cyber punk world by building your way to the exit.

You ARE the Void Runner 

Have fun Ludum dare Friendzzzz.

(made during Ludum Dare 45)

Edit : Fixed version

Because of a problem with the version-control system, we lost a part of our work as we were merging the project. The fixed version is what it would have been without this drawback. Old version is obviously still available as you can see what we really post in due time.
